segments.text: I see this kitchen with a woman standing by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying a plate with a towel, looking so focused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is running full blast behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is overflowing from the sink onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a big puddle forming right at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't noticed yet, one foot is already in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over on the left, there's a boy on a stool reaching into a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl is standing nearby, holding her hand out for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem to be sneaking cookies while the woman is busy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden outside, all calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one slips on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR
